place.name: MYLOR
place.gazetteerText: Mylor, par. and vil., Cornwall, on My lor Creek, Falmouth Harbour - par. (partly within the parl. limits of Penryn and Falmouth), 3599 ac. and 1080 tidal water and 259 foreshore, pop. 2207; vil., 2 miles NE. of Falmouth; P.O., at Mylor Bridge; at the mouth of the creek is Mylor Pool, an anchorage for small vessels. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
